metadata.name: New Process Created Via Taskmgr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a process via the Windows task manager. This might be an attempt to bypass UAC

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\taskmgr.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\mmc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\resmon.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\taskmgr.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a process via the Windows task manager. This might be an attempt to bypass UAC
